something that mentally can set you free
bring you to a higher plane because

just function on the most basic of human

networks of instrumentation that are all
marching to the bee
of the same drum becoming more advanced
as they move forward all focused on the

ant colony would be or the human race

relentlessness and speed and ferocity
it's like what was once organized has

the same rotting corpse and then the

entrancing rock instrumentation on this
LP the songs on this record

many interesting passages and twisted
layers to these songs this thing is just
